attributes.description:
There is much more to it than just its pretty looks with both on and off-road talent. The vehicle is a 2015 Land Rover Range Rover Evoque Prestige. Features of this prestige includes power steering, multi-functioning steering, electric windows, central locking remote, black leather seats, front and rear park distance control, radio/CD player, air conditioning, climate control, meridian sound system and excellent boot space for your extra luggage.  Thank you for choosing Crescent Car Sales. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. We are privileged to help you own what you love. We guarantee 100% satisfaction on all products and services from us. Our price excludes additional costs such as license and registration, COR. The mechanical warranty is optional.
The vehicle is being reduced from 349 995 to 339 995.

attributes.description:
Help shape the future 

Immerse yourself in the exciting world of electric mobility with the Audi e-tron, Whether you’re taking a weekend trip or a longer journey for a holiday – with a maximum range of up to 441 km, the Audi e-tron is definitely suitable for driving long distances. The large high-voltage battery and a smart recuperation system also play their part. 

the Audi e-tron 55 300 Kw S line quattro comes included with a home charging kit, nationwide delivery is available.

attributes.title: 2022 Audi e-tron 55 Advanced

attributes.description:
Design reinterpreted.

 The Audi e-tron Sportback combines the power of a spacious SUV with the elegance of a four-door coupé, The coupé-like roof line underlines the sporty appearance of the Audi e-tron Sportback. It also offers an elegant atmosphere in the interior. the quattro all-wheel drive gives you 300 kW of power and a range² of up to 452 km – get ready for great fun at the wheel. 

The Audi e-tron Sportback quattro S line includes the charging unit upon delivery. nationwide delivery is available.
